name: King Jister 3
description:
As you embark on your quest to rescue Ariabel, immerse yourself in the rich history and lore of the King Jister universe. The game includes complete English dubbing and English and Czech subtitles.

STORY

One fine day (according to the hourglass, the year is 1328), unknown messengers of King Jister kidnapped your sweetheart. You were in a very unusable state, so you could not defend her. Once the messengers have left, our game story begins. The goal is to avenge and rescue Ariabel from the clutches of King Jister.
